thread.title: Here’s who took home a 2017 Grammy Award
thread.title_full: Here’s who took home a 2017 Grammy Award

author: Madison Vanderberg
title: Here’s who took home a 2017 Grammy Award
text:
Here’s who took home a 2017 Grammy Award It’s over and done, did you watch the 2017 Grammy Awards ? Adele’s performance of “Hello” melted our hearts. Beyonce was serving up ART ! Lady Gaga SLAYED onstage and gave us underboob . Paris Jackson gave a shoutout to #NoDapl and was a natural onstage. Prince would have been proud of Bruno Mars’ performance. And Chance the Rapper took us to church! It was a long three-plus hours and while we were frothing at the mouth for all the incredible performers, the show was truly about the awards.
Here’s are the biggest Grammy awards of the night, and for the full list, click here. 
Album of the Year: “25” — Adele
Best New Artist: Chance the Rapper
Kevin Winter/Getty Images for NARAS Record of the Year: “Hello” — Adele
Song of the Year: “Hello” — Adele
Pop Vocal Album: “25” — Adele
Kevin Winter/Getty Images for NARAS Music Video: “Formation” — Beyonce
Pop Solo Performance: “Hello” — Adele
Rap Song: “Hotline Bling” — Drake
OVO Sound Rap Performance: “No Problem” — Chance the Rapper feat. Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz
Rap Album: “Coloring Book” — Chance the Rapper
Rap/Sung Performance: “Hotline Bling” — Drake
Country Song: “Humble and Kind” — Tim McGraw
Country Album: “A Sailor’s Guide to Earth” — Sturgill Simpson
Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images Country Solo Performance: “My Church” — Maren Morris
Rock Song: “Blackstar” — David Bowie
Alternative Music Album: “Blackstar” — David Bowie
Urban Contemporary Album: “Lemonade” — Beyonce
